{"id":1134392375,"question_id":2854,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1704179128,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1134392375/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Decremental String Concatenation","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimizeConcatenatedLength(String[] words) {\n        int len = words.length;\n        int[][][] dp = new int[len][26][26];\n        String w = words[0];\n        return w.length() + dfs(words, 1, w.charAt(0)-'a', w.charAt(w.length()-1)-'a', dp);\n    }\n\n    private int dfs(String[] words, int idx, int st, int ed, int[][][]dp){\n        if(idx==words.length) return 0;\n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE/2;\n        String w = words[idx];\n        int a = w.charAt(0)-'a';\n        int b = w.charAt(w.length()-1)-'a';\n\n        if(dp[idx][st][ed]!=0) return dp[idx][st][ed];\n\n\n        if(ed==a){\n            min = Math.min(min, w.length()-1 + dfs(words, idx+1, st, b, dp));\n        }else\n            min = Math.min(min, w.length() + dfs(words, idx+1, st, b, dp));\n\n        if(st==b){\n            min = Math.min(min, w.length()-1 + dfs(words, idx+1, a, ed, dp));\n        }else{\n            min = Math.min(min, w.length() + dfs(words, idx+1, a, ed, dp));\n        }\n\n        dp[idx][st][ed] = min;\n        return min;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"decremental-string-concatenation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
